Title: Apache Commons BCEL: Remote Code Execution
Synopsis: A vulnerability has been discovered in Apache Commons BCEL, which can lead to remote code execution.

Background.Text: The Byte Code Engineering Library (Apache Commons BCELâ„¢) is intended to give users a convenient way to analyze, create, and manipulate (binary) Java class files (those ending with .class).

Description.Text: A vulnerability has been discovered in U-Boot tools. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: Please review the referenced CVE identifier for details.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All Apache Commons BCEL users should upgrade to the latest version:
